original_text: And Hilkiah answered and said to Shaphan the scribe, I have found the book of the law in the house of the Lord. And Hilkiah delivered the book to Shaphan.
korean_text: 힐기야가 서기관 사반에게 말하여 이르되 내가 여호와의 전에서 율법책을 발견하였노라 하고 힐기야가 그 책을 사반에게 주매

sentences.original_text: and said to Shaphan the scribe,
I have found the book of the law
in the house of the Lord.
And Hilkiah delivered the book to Shaphan.
